content: this crochet pattern will help you create a heart granny square the granny square has a solid heart centre and can be used to create freestyle blankets bags etc it s a cute design for little girls aran / worsted weight 4 yarn i used drops uni color paris 12 yards of each color supplies you will need crochet hook 5mm aran/worsted/#4 yarn scissors recommend skill level is intermediate the pattern is written in usa terminology you will need to know basic crochet stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet dtr you ll also need to know how to work into a magic_ring and back loops the pattern is 4 pages long and includes gauge instructions and lots of progress photos a free basic version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/
